description:
Like us on Facebook and/or Follow us on Twitter. Message us to let us know you liked us, or Tweet us @sr_elearning.

Whether you already know some Photoshop or you have never used Photoshop before, this course will get you on your way to being a true digital artist.

What You Will Learn

In Photoshop for Artists, you will start by learning the basics of Photoshop for those who need help getting started. You will then move on to hours of tutorials on how to create art from a successful game art designer.

You will learn neat artists' tricks like using vanishing points, compositing images, and using effects like 3D and liquefy to create truly stunning visual effects.

Who Should Take This Course?

You should take this course if you're interested in creating digital art, learning art design for video games, movies or other media, or learning graphic design from an artist's perspective.
title: Photoshop For Artists
